component.name: Stunt Rally
component.summary: Racing game with rally style of driving

description.p: Stunt Rally is a racing game with rally style of driving, mostly on gravel. It features a rich variety of 229 tracks in 40 sceneries also on other planets.
Track difficulty ranges from short and easy to very difficult stunt tracks including jumps, skewed loops, pipes winding in 3D, obstacles or all at once.
There are 33 vehicles to choose from, which include both regular cars and Sci-Fi hovering.
Game modes include: Single Race, Tutorials, Championships, Challenges, Collections, Multiplayer and Split Screen. Also Replays and Ghost drive are present.
The Track Editor allows creating and modifying tracks. It uses a 3D spline generated road.
